original_text: Every male child among you must be circumcised when he is eight days old. You must continue to do this for every generation. Do it for every male that lives with you, not just your own family. Circumcise servants that have been born in your house. Also circumcise foreign servants that you have bought with money.
korean_text: 너희의 대대로 모든 남자는 집에서 난 자나 또는 너희 자손이 아니라 이방 사람에게서 돈으로 산 자를 막론하고 난 지 팔 일 만에 할례를 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: Every male child among you must be circumcised
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중의 모든 남자 아이는 할례를 받아야 하며

sentences.original_text: when he is eight days old
You must continue to do this

sentences.korean_translation: 너희와 함께 사는 모든 남자에게 행하라

sentences.original_text: that have been born in your house
that you have bought with money
